title: joeperry
author: joeperry
content: Application Format:Code:[b]Bitcointalk Username[/b]:[b]Utopia username[/b]:[b]Utopia Public Key[/b]:[b]BTC Address:[/b][b]Message Deep Link (Chat link):[/b][b]Slot No:[/b]Previous RoundsRound 1 Round 11Round 2 Round 12Round 3 Round 13Round 4 Round 14Round 5 Round 15Round 6 Round 16Round 7 Round 17Round 8 Round 18Round 9 Round 19Round 10 Round 20

comments.author: joeperry
comments.created_time: July 17, 2023, 11:34:49 AMLast edit: July 24, 2023, 10:20:06 AM by joeperry
comments.body: The raffle draw will be held on Monday July 24, 2023 (Forum time). Cut-off for application is until Sunday July 23 (23:59:59 | Forum time).Last numbers of the hash from the blocks that I will choose will be the winners.>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> We have new format, which now includes Utopia username for easier cross-checking. Thank you <<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<Slots:Code:00 - 01 - 02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - 04 - 05 - 06 - Franctoshi07 - 08 - 09 - 10 - 11 - sompitonov12 - 13 - 14 - 15 - Mfahad16 - 17 - 18 - 19 - bitLeap20 - 21 - 22 - 23 - Oasisman24 - 25 - 26 - m201727 - gunhell1628 - iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc229 - 30 - 31 - 32 - 33 - Myleschetty34 - notblox135 - 36 - 37 - 38 - temple39 - Piebeyb40 - Eternad41 - khiholangkang42 - 43 - 44 - 45 - Daltonik46 - 47 - 48 - 49 - 50 - loveurself42051 - 52 - 53 - yhiaali354 - 55 - 56 - 57 - Woodie58 - 59 - 60 - jossiel61 - mvdheuvel198362 - 63 - ajiz13864 - 65 - 66 - 67 - 68 - 69 - Avirunes70 - examplens71 - Learn Bitcoin72 - 73 - 74 - 75 - tiCeR76 - wwzsocki77 - 78 - 79 - suzanne522380 - 81 - Not your key not your BTC82 - 83 - 84 - 85 - 86 - Jateng87 - mv198688 - 89 - 90 - 91 - 92 - 93 - Haunebu94 - 95 - 96 - 97 - 98 - malcovi299 - pawel7777Note:

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: Hi guys we have new application format which includes Utopia username, it would help me in cross-checking the applications. Thank you and good luck everyone!
